s: Customers find the Telrad mounting base works as well as the original finder and is easy to mount, with one mentioning it's convenient for switching between scopes. The product fits perfectly and customers appreciate its solid construction, with one noting it's not a cheap knockoff.

t: Amazon.com : Telrad Pulser Unit for Finder : Telescope Finderscopes : Electronics
s: The Telrad Pulser will greatly increase the battery life for your Telrad and in addittion it improves contrast by pulsing the reticle image on and off thus aiding in locating faint objects. Following the simple instructions you can easily install the pulser in a short time.

t: Amazon.com : Telrad Finder Sight : Spotting Scopes : Electronics
s: The easiest way to aim a telescope. The view seen through the window of the Telrad is continuous with the sky around it, not magnified or upside down. Three rings are lighted and appear to lie among the stars. The small ring outlines the Moon-sized area seen in the telescope.

t: Amazon.com: Telrad Finder Sight Red / Green Switchable with Mounting Base
s: NEW: New model with user-selectable red or green illumination. There is a new toggle switch on the front of the Telrad on one side that lets you easily select the illumination color you want for the best contrast against the sky background. The standard Telrad only as red illumination.
